Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Paulina
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Paulina, due to street blockage near Madison/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Paulina, due to street blockage near Madison/Paulina.

Eastbound #20 Madison buses will operate via Madison, Paulina, Washington, Damen, Madison and over regular route.

Westbound #20 Madison buses will operate via Madison, Damen, Warren, Paulina, Madison and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
